flawed_nl_solution:
The trucks cost 60 bottle caps because 10 x 6 = <<10*6=60>>60
He has 60 bottle caps left because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=60>>60
He spends 45 bottle caps on cars because 60 x 0.75 = <<60*0.75=45>>45
He gets 9 cars with this because 45 / 5 = <<45/5=9>>9
He gets 19 vehicles in total because 10 + 9 = <<10+9=19>>19
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
